CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound pewter
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding pewter chains the body in fatigue. Strength drains, limbs tremble, and every movement feels like dragging stone â€” all to store boundless power in metal. With enough strain, the Allomancer will move mountains with a single blow.
